explanation: [0-0] A little boy in a blue cotton jacket is sitting on a wooden rocking horse. The rocking horse is standing on the ground, its head covered with a black hood. There are some big trees in the background. Purple watermarks appear at the top and bottom of the image.
[0-2] Then the little boy grabs the reins of the rocking horse with his hands and shakes them back and forth.
[0-2] Then the little boy grabs the reins of the rocking horse with his hands and shakes them back and forth.
[2-4] Subsequently, the little boy grabs the reins on the horse's neck and shakes the horse's head back and forth.
